item.title: A look back to last year's predictions
item.description: My predictions for 2008 were very hit and miss (mainly miss), here’s a quick re-cap: Cubic Telecom will have a Â£100m exit * Not yet. 2008 was an amazing year for Pat and the team with deals happening at breakneck pace. European Founders, Howzat Media, TAG or Advent will do a deal with a web or mobile start-up here * Again not yet. I still think this will happen More foreign VCs will invest in Irish web start-ups than Irish VCs
